IF(NOT CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

### DEPENDS ####
DKDEPEND(gs922w64)


### INSTALL ###
IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/ImageMagick-7.0.11-6-portable-Q16-x86)
	## DKINSTALL(http://ftp.icm.edu.pl/packages/ImageMagick/binaries/ImageMagick-7.0.11-6-portable-Q16-x86.zip ImageMagick-7.0.11-6-portable-Q16-x86)
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	DKDOWNLOAD(http://ftp.icm.edu.pl/packages/ImageMagick/binaries/ImageMagick-7.0.11-6-portable-Q16-x86)
	DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/ImageMagick-7.0.11-6-portable-Q16-x86.zip ${3RDPARTY}/ImageMagick-7.0.11-6-portable-Q16-x86)
ENDIF()
DKSET(IMAGEMAGICK ${3RDPARTY}/ImageMagick-7.0.11-6-portable-Q16-x86)
